title: Pumpkin and ginger custard pie
ingredients: ['1 (23cm) baked pastry base', '3 eggs', '240ml whipping cream', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '100g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon ground allspice', '250g pureed pumpkin', '2 tablespoons chopped crystallised ginger', '4 tablespoons cognac', '120ml cream, whipped (optional)']
